data.text: @BrettDwyer1 @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz And so it could be in a Republic where the head is State is a bi-partisan appointment of the parliament.

@BrettDwyer1 @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Well they aren’t - we can’t have a PM with the GG sign off. No way am I suggesting a direct election. The process remains as is now - just no deferring to “mother England”
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz It's pretty disgusting that Republicans  feel the need to cede the agenda so far as to declare some tittering clothes horse 'cute' rather than ready for the guillotine
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Maybe we’re too smart. Without a credible alternative, I’m sticking with the monarchy.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz bit like a few of the Mad Right Journo s on Sky , Newcorp etc , would have been in their Element working for Certain German Publication s in the 1930 s

@ellendavismee @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz A direct election candidate would need patronage, funding, organisation and likely a fair size ego, they will come with agenda's. It's flunky but the beauty of the current design is that the power within the role is divested to someone who will never use it.

@ellendavismee @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Realpolitik would determine that a direct election candidate would be a political animal probably more so than a PM. Consensus candidate approved by joint sitting the only viable option. Current arrangements for GG are essentially administrive and ceremonial and of service.

@BrettDwyer1 @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz What about a model that is the same in all respects other than the GG being the Queen’s rep? The GG (or Pres)
Is answerable to the AUS people and a true Head of State.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Samantha your a lefty idiot get over it embrace the pirate lead the world to nirvana there’s got to be more of the brain dead out there
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz https://t.co/KJukLRoRIN

@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz The majority of Commonwealth nations are in fact, Republics. In the Commonwealth Games in India, there were 32 Republics competing out of 53 nations as a whole. Commonwealth Republics include such nations as India, South Africa, Singapore, Pakistan, Cyprus and Malta.Jun 30, 2011

@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz There are a lot of republics.
https://t.co/3Abetv3tFw
@marcuskelson @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Not going to stone you but I would like it if one day an Australian Born Person could become Australia’s head of state.
@ellendavismee @BrettDwyer1 @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Canada is not a republic and Queen Elizabeth is still its head of state.
@samanthamaiden @Stringy32 @Peter_Fitz Well I know I’m not that stupid anyway.  Won’t see a republic in my my time but it will happen one day I believe
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Must really cut you 2 knowing they be around for years and getting more popular by the day. keep tweeting your irrelvant tweets
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz And don’t get me wrong l believe in it but since Howard basically ambushed the argument the momentum has been like watching a balloon lose air.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Really does anyone care about a republic anymore ~ I’m going to get stoned to death for saying this but meh.

@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Yes, it makes absolute sense for us to be a Republic, but I refer you to Richos thoughts. After the visit of the Duke and Duchess the idea might not be dead in the water, but it’s floundering. Harry is a pretty impressive young bloke, too.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Peter Fitzgerald is doing a great job #republic. PS l liked Meghan  but didn’t change my mind on a #republic. We need to do this
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Peter needs to hand over to someone else. The ARM will continue to fail while it’s run by spivs.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz I hope you’re right, but fear you’re wrong. We are becoming that dumb, IMO
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz A couple of entitled twats don’t change a thing. #republicofoz

@ellendavismee @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz 75 can be looked at several ways, my view is that with all sides acting recklessly(including the GG) the system in place quickly lead to the electorate being invoked and settling the issue unambiguously. I will support a Rep model that can be shown to improve current settings.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz She's not even Australian; I think we've paid our dues to the British Empire... we're well past our time to become independent.
@TjornSibma @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz @chriskkenny You may call me cerebral but never mainstream
@TjornSibma @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz @chriskkenny Stawp

@Chris_Hoare @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Poor Chris when you hang with Paul Murray, Rowan Dean and PETA Credlin it is easy to see yourself as Aquinas. Even if the flinging of your own poo is mandatory for #skynewsfreaks Ross Cameron just eats his
@thegenuinefitz @samanthamaiden @YatesElec @Peter_Fitz Ha ha I see the funny side.
@evolvewrite @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Yes. I think Treaty and Republic should go hand in hand.

@BrettDwyer1 @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Not in 1975. And it doesn’t work well every time I see a PM or Minister signed in by the Queen’s representative. Republics do work well in so many other member nations of the Commonwealth. Oh Canada.
@Gavneedham @JanGulli12 @priszuzul @PMBarraclough @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz President Abbott. Really
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Republic - farcical idea and unnecessary.

@Rosebanktom @samanthamaiden @YatesElec @Peter_Fitz How to wave? How to cut ribbons and smile at the same time? Hardest part of the job is making small talk, which I agree could be awkward, but I’m sure they’ll manage.

@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz The queen, god nless her, is more forward thinking than most people on the conservative side. I don't think people will vote for a republic unless they know the model first. Too worried politicians will hijack it.
@samanthamaiden @xskinn @Peter_Fitz What is broken is not the monarchy, well maybe Charles is still limping.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Weird that Kenny always decides a personal attack is warranted. Obviously knows his argument isn’t strong enough on its own...
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz The "Australian"; wrong name for toilet paper.

@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Australia threw out a government with the second lowest debt to GDP ratio in the world and believed we had a “debt crisis”. And believed that putting in more copper that optical fibre was a good idea. 

We aren’t smart.

@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz @chriskkenny assessment is spot on. And as someone who has worked with - and for a time was supervised by @cooneymj - I can attest to his cerebral capacity and understanding the need to win conservatives over
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Australia would need a Treaty to become an authentic Republic or we would just be another colony playing dress-up.

@helskihall @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz It's similar to the argument you had with yourself when you considered moving out of home.

Why did you move out ?

Was it #SelfDetermination ?

Can your parents still veto your decisions? Sure you still love them, but you make the decisions, right ?

Right?

Get it?

Get it ?
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz We need to move forward like so many other British colonial and truly become Australia
@samanthamaiden @yabbietol @Peter_Fitz She's not that cute anyway..I see a prettier girl on the bus tonight..
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz She may well be cute, but given a microphone I expect a solid Republic line. Yoga, too. Yay.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Liz, said "WTF are you waiting for, Straya"? She didn't say "Abbott is a regressive, purgative tunc", but that is what she is thinking, IMHO.

@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz It's not a bullshit theory and it's not just about how cute Meghan is. It's about the relevance and activism of the young royals, that's driving the monarchy's renewed popularity with our young people. And as a lifelong Republican, the Pirate lost me a long time ago...
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Lol sounds like a Micheal Kroger theory to me 😂😂#auspol
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Spot on Samantha.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz It’s a story by @chriskkenny for chrissake - surely nobody takes him seriously, do they?

@PMBarraclough @priszuzul @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz I see a French style republic, it’s done well for them since the 18th century 😊 first get rid of this government, then a long period of stability with the now opposition in government then vive le republic after a referendum of course. I’d even have their national anthem 😍
@priszuzul @JanGulli12 @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz You have a point. I just see a very simple model with the GG replaced by a prez.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz We won’t be a republic anytime soon, if ever.

@priszuzul @PMBarraclough @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Unfortunately we cannot base the republic we would like on Trump, he is way out there on his own except for the new president of Brazil and the Phillipines, I forgot about those two 😊

@PMBarraclough @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz The royals are nice young people in a position that allows them to do very good things for people. As do many "ordinary" people in society. I can't imagine that they give a toss whether or not their family "rules over" Australia.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Time to move on. You can still have your adornment of the royals. This is just silly.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Am still yet to hear a valid argument for being a Republic. Having a head of state is not a valid argument
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Well they are if the Victorian and federal polls are accurate.

@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz @samanthamaiden the caravan has moved on. The royals are behaving with dignity. The leader of the republicans is a crazy left pirate with no credibility. The cause is screwed until you get someone with a brain to lead it and nominate how the President would be elected.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz https://t.co/vrtFGcopp5
@RohanCT @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz That's the problem with the Republic push, it's just not thought through. Far more questions than answers.

@samanthamaiden @ItsBouquet @Peter_Fitz How to manipulate people’s thinking .. create the belief that those who see no reason to charge our constitution only to do so because Megan is cute .. you’re right .. Australians are not that stupid ..

@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz I'm ambivalent towards a republic or not but I can't recall Melbourne being more engrossed as it was when they were here. The other issue is the republic model put forward won't wash with the public
@samanthamaiden @geebeeWA @Peter_Fitz The rest of the world problem doesn't know or care that the Queen is head of State or Queen of the world

@samanthamaiden @croydoncathy @Peter_Fitz This study negates the theory the the former British Army helicopter pilot and US actress will make Australians less likely to want a republic. Voters can differentiate between the British Royals as people and the desire for an Australian Head of State

@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz I’m a fan of his, though I know a few that aren’t and I think it’s mainly the bandana. Maybe it’s time to drop it Pete and get a ‘ Let’s Make Australia Great Again’ baseball cap. I’m sure yer missus would approve...
👍😃🤜🏻🤛🏻

@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz A better reason not to become a Republic is that our Govenors General do a great job and we don’t want a President Hanson or President Palmer.

@PMBarraclough @samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Yes I’m a bit that way, difficult to admit at times but they are rather lovely to look at ❤️❤️

@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Samantha, sorry, Australians ARE that stupid. If in doubt, come to the Central Coast. IQ minus. Good on Peter FitzSimons. I am now a republican, royalist for years, but US hypocrisy ended that. I was a Queen and Harry fan, now opposite. Divorced, American? The Crown? A Republic!
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz She’s not cute she is absolutely beautiful
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Hard to find one more knowledgeable passionate and forthright for the job than  Fitz ,
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz I am a bit of a sucker for the young royals - but I am in no way swayed from republicanism

@NavyBlue10 @samanthamaiden @BobBrace2 @Peter_Fitz And that'll be the argument.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Fitz is the best thing that ever happened to the monarchy (apart from Malcolm Turnbull, that is).
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz I'm 100% for a republic but we won't get it with the buffoon PF at the helm. We need sensible reasoned debate not comic strip activism.

@Melbchief @samanthamaiden @BobBrace2 @Peter_Fitz Which is exactly what we don’t need - our major political institutions are NOT broken and don’t need a major overhaul - a direct election model risks creating an alternative centre of political power.

@samanthamaiden @YatesElec @Peter_Fitz Monarchy are trained from birth for the role and surrounded by advisors. Is it part of our school curriculum on how to be a President? Should be if we going down that path. What would be taught?

@samanthamaiden @BobBrace2 @Peter_Fitz There is a lesson in that. The '99 referendum was backed by the major media groups, a gaggle of celebrities and most parliamentarians. The next campaign needs to be built from the ground up, not the top down. I suspect it may need a direct election model to succeed.

@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz The problem with overturning the constitutional status quo is that regardless of the optics  the current arrangements the plain truth is it works very well. The current disfunction within the elected side of the constitution has done more to reinforce the status quo than Meghan
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Hear hear!
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Murdoch rag trying to smear someone who doesn’t support Murdoch ideology? Well I NEVER!!
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Huh, I thought people just got into @Peter_Fitz pet be abuse of the Bandanna 🤣🤣🤣
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Peter's love and knowledge of Australian history are a great start. Personally I don't see the bandana as a problem. I could probably use one myself.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Australians are not stupid, yet we still managed to elect Barnaby, Roberts, Dastyari, Morrison etc etc etc
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz The pirate treats his fellow Australians like they’re stupid so he deserves to cop what he gets.
@samanthamaiden @Peter_Fitz Meghan Markle is cute however that has nothing to do with us becoming a republic. It will happen soon, I hope.
